reviews.review: Play the original!

Quel dommage qu’aucun soin n’ai été apporté à cette refonte du jeu original. Glitches visuels affreux, bugs de script révoltants, plantages incompréhensibles... Les mots me manquent pour exprimer ma déception. La prochaine fois, cher Valve, laisse faire les vrais passionnés.
Retournez jouer à l’original de 1998. Ne perdez pas votre temps et votre argent sur cet écueil inadmissible pondu par cette (autrefois) si prestigieuse équipe.

sucks

Please for the love of god do not play this version of Half-Life if you want to experience the original game. Play the original version or Black Mesa, NOT this one. Half-Life: Source is an incredibly broken port. There's one map about halfway through the game where the visuals completely vomit, and it's impossible to tell where you're going. Enemy placements are different or missing. Some graphical effects look worse (somehow). Some entities or models are misplaced. The physics are different, resulting in the player being able to make longer and higher jumps allowing you to skip entire sections of certain maps. It's REALLY bad.

If you want to play the original Half-Life, just buy the [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/70/HalfLife/]GoldSrc version[/url] or buy [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/362890/Black_Mesa/]Black Mesa.[/url] The only situation I can ever think of someone actually buying this is so that they get the HL:S content for Garry's Mod. Just do yourself a favour and spend the £6 (or your regional equivalent) elsewhere.

Half Life Source is a remake of the original Half Life game with updated graphics and color...or so I've heard. I honestly never played the original half life so I don't know what the textures look like or what the difference between the two games are. My main focus is going to be rating this game without any previous knowledge of the Half Life games. This game is good, not the best, but good. Of course the game is a little outdated but that doesn't mean its not fun. The game is a first person shooter/puzzle game where you take on the point of view of Gorden Freeman. Story wise, this game is OK. There is not much story in this game other than short conversations with the NPC's throughout the game. Sound and music in this game are pretty good. There are a lot of silent moments where you wish something was playing in the background but its not too bad. The main part of this game comes from the puzzles and gameplay. Shooting people and aliens throughout the game with different weapons that you acquire, keeps the campaign refreshing and fun. There are some parts where you will get really confused such as the puzzles or when you are fighting a boss but its nothing too taxing. The best part of the game is the ending (I won't spoil). All in all, I can see how this game was very popular in 1998. I would say it BARLEY holds up today. So if you like older games and don't mind the old style shooters, I would say this game is totally worth the play.
hl source > hl

Hola, antes que nada te agradezco mucho por leer mi humilde opinion sobre este juego.




Recordemos que este analisis solo es mi opinion y no se tiene que tomar tan a pecho.

Pues... ¿en donde empiezo? a mi parecer, Valve arruino un poco ese "sabor" del Half Life clasico, y no solo fue por el hecho de que le implementaron el motor grafico de Source a el Half Life clasico que todos conocemos solo que... le pudieron haber hecho mas que una adaptacion.

Prueba A: El motor Source no cuadra muy bien con el juego, los NpcS tienen radgolls y eso me encanto creo que le dio un toque realista al juego, pero como cualquier cosa, tiene sus pros y contras, los graficos del agua no cuadran muy bien en varios escenarios, ((( SPOILER )))un buen ejemplo seria cuando tienes que pasar por una Gargantuar y activar unos rieles, en tu camino a encender el poder central para asi poder mover el carro y asi atravesar por los rieles, el una sala de mantenimiento veras que el cuarto ese lleno de bichos raros parecidos a los gusanos, recuerdo muy bien que en el Half Life original esa agua parecia tener una aparencia "cochina", por lo que en su adaptacion Source no lo esta.((( FIN DEL SPOILER)))

Prueba B: Valve pudo haber hecho mas que solo implementar el motor Source en el primer Half Life, bien pudieron hacer un remake como lo hizo Black Mesa, y valla que Black Mesa fue muy bien recibido y seguimos esperando noticias de el, y es que esto resulto un poco mal para los seguidores de la saga, al comprar el Valve Complete Pack te daran todos los juegos hechos por Valve a la fecha, OJO dije Valve, Black Mesa no fue desarrollada por Valve y a todos aquellos que nos compramos el paquete nos hubiera gustado mas tener el juego Black Mesa en vez de tener a esta adaptacion.

Prueba C (final): Quiero terminar esto con un... Recomendable, si el juego a veces no cumple con lo que te esperabas, o nisiquiera lo intenta a veces, pero hey recordemos que solo es una adaptacion, solamente movieron el motor Source al Half Life. Basicamente es lo mismo que vimos en el Half Life original solo que con una mejor calidad y si, muchos me deben de querer "linchar" ahora mismo por que solo tengo 2 horas en el juego o solo por que dicen que no termine nisiquiera el juego, ustedes pueden decir lo que quieran como esta es mi opinion ustedes tambien pueden dar la suya.

Gracias por leer <3

It's a poor excuse for a source port. They didn't remake shit. They instead used the old textures and models from the original game but because those are optimized for GoldSrc instead, there's bugs/glitches everywhere. Buy the original Half Life instead so you avoid bugs or if you want a "prettier" Half Life, get Black Mesa.

关于戈登”脚滑“的问题
其实这是一个bug，解决方法如下：
跳的时候在合适的时机按下“S”键，戈登可以跳到你觉得合适的位置。
如果不习惯这种操作的玩家们，我推荐《Black Mesa》，祝你们玩得愉快！

Купил.. запустил.. Был очень рад, довольно интересный геймплей, с первых минут игры чувствовал только радость ведь не смотря на графику игра ооочень крутая. Графодрочерам такой продукт конечно не понравится, но тем кто помнит и кто не забыл про эту игру тот ни разу ни скажет что графон плохой.

Kupilem niedawno te gre, poniewaz czuje sentyment do tej serii (great job valve xd). Swietnie wspominam zarowno pierwsza, jak i druga czesc Half-Life'a. Pomyslalem wiec sobie, czemu by nie zagrac w jedynke na nowym silniku, lecz zawiodlem sie. Juz tlumacze: pod koniec 11, czy 12 rozdzialu wystepuje pewien problem - przez ten problem, o ktorym pisze - gra nie chce puscic mnie dalej. Z kanalu, w ktorym jest podkladajacy bombe zolnierz, gracz nie moze przejsc dalej. Sprawdzilem nawet, czy czasami nie robie czegos zle (nigdy nie korzystalem z solucji, poniewaz, moim zdaniem, w grach komputerowych chodzi o to, zeby je samodzielnie przejsc) na filmie zagranicznego youtubera, ale bylo wszystko dobrze u niego. Ostatnie zdanie napisalem po to, aby ludzie nie mowili, ze pisze bzdury - nie sugerowalem sie niczyim zdaniem, napisalem tylko moje odczucia z rozgrywki.

This sounded like a good idea. Think about it, one of the best games ever in one of the best game engines ever. But instead of a complete remake (Counter-Strike Souce, Day of Defeat Source), it was just a remaster. A remaster with amazing lighting, great water, and ragdoll physics. I was mad at this realization, but I decided to keep playing. When I started it, it was all normal. I decided to do the training course first, but instead of a full body hologram greeting me and helping me, I saw a disembodied head floating around, talking to me. I was ok about this glitch, because I encoutered some in my first play of the original Half-Life. After the jump-crouch-jump part, I was greeted by a lot of frame smear. I turned to the left, and it was gone. I managed to get that image out of my head and moved on. The rest of the course was normal, except that floating head. During these later parts, I found the only redeeming qualities of this game:  Lighting and water. I finished the training course and went on to the actual game. For some strange reason, I had EVERY chapter in the game unlocked! Has this game been spying on my progress in the original game? I started the first chapter, Black Mesa Inbound. I turned back, only to find more smear. I was done. I can't beleive Gearbox (Gearbox made the port, and Valve released it) would be so lazy. They did good on Opposing Force and Blue Shift but why wouldn't they try on this one (I know I'm playing this game after the Valve patch, which might've caused some problems)?! Don't get this game on its own, and instead get it on the Valve Complete Pack, so you don't feel that you just wasted $10 on a glitchy mess.

1/10 Good lighting and water, but intense smear.
Too many bugs, too many fun.

All right, Gordon, your suit should keep you comfortable through all this. The specimen will be delivered to you in a few moments. If you would be so good as to climb up and start the rotors, we can bring the Anti-Mass Spectrometer to eighty percent and hold it there until the carrier arrives.

We've boosted the Anti-Mass Spectrometer to 105 percent. Bit of a gamble, but we need the extra resolution.

Gordon, we cannot predict how long the system can operate at this level, nor how long the reading will take. Please work as quickly as you can.

Gordon doesn't need to hear all this. He's a highly trained professional. We have assured the Administrator that nothing will go wrong.

Шедевр игростроения конца 90-х годов. То что сделал Гейб Ньюэлл и команда Valve  назвыется революцией ! Эта игра стояла у истоков жанра и предопределила его развитие на долгие годы вперед. Графика , сюжет , геймдизайн все это покорило сердца миллионов игроков по всему земному шару. Игра произвела настоящий фурор и стала классикой ! Невозможно предугадать какой эффект был бы от еще и не реализованных идей команды Valve в первой части Half-Life. От противников , которые выискивают вас по запаху до использования аэрозоли как пометки что-бы не заблудиться в длинных коридорах исследовательского  комплекса Black Mesa. Игра обязательна к прохождению каждому уважающего себя геймеру , можно петь бесконечные дифирамбы , но ясно одно. Играли ВСЕ , исконный шутер перед вами господа, покупаем скачиваем наслаждаемся !

Ah, the good old Half-Life we all know and love. Except this time it's sligtly more prettier. Thats about it. It's the original Half-Life, but this ones water effects look cooler. To be honest, thats all I noticed. A part from few visual bugs and for some reason the giant worm thing from chapter "blast pit" not dealing any damage to anyone (nothing really game breaking, if you ask me), it pretty much changes nothing. But being same price as the original, it all comes down to personal preference. If you really want original Half-Life with good graphics, get Black Mesa instead, atleast there the changes are noticable.
